title.narrative: Tibet Health Personnel Capacity Building Program

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports the Tibet Health Capacity Building Program (THCBP) in the Tibet Autonomous Region (Tibet) which aims to improve the health of the people of Tibet by providing more efficient and better quality health service delivery. The program has two components: health human resource management – to improve human resource management practices at the strategic &#38;#38; operational levels; and technical and clinical practices -- to improve technical &#38;#38; clinical practices of the workforce in pilot sites. The program will help Tibet health officials make more effective use of staff and improve clinical and technical skills. In response to low teaching capacity in health, the program will improve the training skills of both the health institutions and their experienced health staff. Expected outcomes include: services planned and delivered on time, and resource allocation will reflect health needs and the relative burden of disease (factors contributing to morbidity and
